question: Poulomi Ghatak who was seen in news recently, is associated with which sport?
explanation:
One of the most successful women Table Tennis players of India, Poulomi Ghatak has announced her retirement.
She is a seven-time National title winner in Table Tennis, just short of the record of 8 titles currently held by Indu Puri. She is to concentrate on Table-Tennis coaching. Poulomiâ€™s had inaugurated her academy in June last year, along with her husband Soumyadip Roy, who is also a former National TT Champion.
